__TOC__

=== evince-2.30.3 ===

* bzr Makefile.am needs -lICE to link, so added to configure.ac
	  dnl When linking with --as-needed, add -lICE to LIBS.
	  AC_CHECK_LIB(ICE, IceRelease,,)
* https://bugzilla.gnome.org/show_bug.cgi?id=624948

=== Patch ===

<pre>
=== modified file 'configure.ac'
--- configure.ac	2010-07-20 15:07:40 +0000
+++ configure.ac	2010-07-21 16:48:23 +0000
@@ -218,6 +218,9 @@
m BACKEND_LIBTOOL_FLAGS="-module -avoid-version -no-undefined -export-symbols \$(top_srcdir)/backend/backend.symbols"
 AC_SUBST(BACKEND_LIBTOOL_FLAGS)
 
+dnl When linking with --as-needed, add -lICE to LIBS.
+(ICE, IceRelease,,)
+
 evince_save_LIBS=$LIBS
 LIBS="$LIBS $BACKEND_LIBS"
</pre>
